amendment.description: Amendment sought to require GAO to conduct a study of the economic impact funds awarded through the Prevention and Public Health Fund would have on states and communities and then to submit a report to Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-61 to require the U.S. Government Accountability Office to conduct a study of the economic impact funds awarded through the Prevention and Public Health Fund would have on states and communities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 238 (Roll no. 262).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Castor (FL).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 238 (Roll no. 262).
